parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the peripheral configuration structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_WDT_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_wdt_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified WDT interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if interrupts are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the WDT interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified WDT events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be processed, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK.

simplesect.para: Mask of events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().
nrf_wdt_task_trigger Function for starting the WDT task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_task_address_get Function for returning the address of a specific WDT task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task.

simplesect.para: Address of requested task register.
nrf_wdt_event_clear Function for clearing the WDT event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_event_check Function for retrieving the state of the WDT event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_event_address_get Function for returning the address of a specific WDT event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event.

simplesect.para: Address of requested event register.
nrf_wdt_int_enable Function for enabling the specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_wdt_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_wdt_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.
nrf_wdt_int_disable Function for disabling the specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_wdt_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_subscribe_set Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given WDT task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_subscribe_clear Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given WDT task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_publish_set Function for setting the publish configuration for a given WDT event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_publish_clear Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given WDT event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_behaviour_set Function for configuring the watchdog behaviour when the CPU is sleeping or halted.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Watchdog behaviour mask, created using nrf_wdt_behaviour_mask_t.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_started_check Function for retrieving the watchdog status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The watchdog is started.
The watchdog is not started.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_request_status_check Function for retrieving the watchdog reload request status for specified register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Reload request register to be checked.
Reload request is running.
No reload requests are running.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_request_status_get Function for retrieving the watchdog reload requests status mask.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Running reload requests mask, constructed with nrf_wdt_rr_register_mask_t.
nrf_wdt_reload_value_set Function for setting the watchdog reload value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Watchdog counter initial value.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_reload_value_get Function for retrieving the watchdog reload value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Reload value.
nrf_wdt_reload_request_enable Function for enabling a specific reload request register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Reload request register to be enabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_reload_request_disable Function for disabling a specific reload request register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Reload request register to be disabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_reload_request_enable_check Function for retrieving the status of a specific reload request register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Reload request register to be checked.
The reload request register is enabled.
The reload request register is not enabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_reload_request_set Function for setting a specific reload request register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Reload request register to set.

simplesect.para: nrf_wdt_task_stop_enable_set Function for enabling or disabling stopping the watchdog.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if stopping is to be enabled, false otherwise.

simplesect.para: NRF_WDT_HAS_STOP Presence of Task STOP functionality.

briefdescription.para: Hardware access layer with cache and barrier support for managing the WDT peripheral.
